009package imagingbook.common.geometry.basic;
010
011public abstract class PntUtils {
012        
013        public static Pnt2d centroid(Pnt2d[] pts) {
014                final int n = pts.length;
015                double sx = 0;
016                double sy = 0;
017                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
018                        sx = sx + pts[i].getX();
019                        sy = sy + pts[i].getY();
020                }
021                return Pnt2d.from(sx/n, sy/n);
022        }
023        
024        public static double[][] toDoubleArray(Pnt2d[] pts) {
025                final int n = pts.length;
026                double[][] pa = new double[n][2];
027                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
028                        pa[i][0] = pts[i].getX();
029                        pa[i][1] = pts[i].getY();
030                }
031                return pa;
032        }
033        
034        public static Pnt2d[] fromDoubleArray(double[][] pa) {
035                final int n = pa.length;
036                Pnt2d[] pts = new Pnt2d[n];
037                for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
038                        pts[i] = Pnt2d.from(pa[i]);
039                }
040                return pts;
041        }
042        
043}
